	initialize: function (n) {
		ms.log('Creating new object');
		this.number = (n - 0) || 0;

	},
	type: 'SimpleAdd'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>ecc_agent_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-10-08 19:29:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0d59ba5a4f566200c17782818110c73e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SimpleAdd</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Hotel" source="x_hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>ecc_agent_script_include_0d59ba5a4f566200c17782818110c73e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-10-08 19:30:04</sys_updated_on></ecc_agent_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Clean on end of reservation</name><run_as display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2016-10-07 01:12:46</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 20:00:00</run_time><run_type>daily</run_type><script><![CDATA[var res = new GlideRecord('x_hotel_reservation');
res.addQuery('departure', gs.now());
res.addNotNullQuery('room');
res.query();
while (res.next()) {
	gs.eventQueue('x_hotel.room.reservation_end', res.room.getRefRecord());

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Multiply</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	
	var body = {};
	body.answer = request.pathParams.a * request.pathParams.b;
	response.setBody(body);
	
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_hotel/math/multiply/{a}/{b}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/multiply/{a}/{b}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-10-08 18:45:36</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a34fea964f566200c17782818110c766</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Multiply</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Hotel" source="x_hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_a34fea964f566200c17782818110c766</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-10-08 18:45:36</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Math">cb3faa964f566200c17782818110c7b6</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_5d47aa164f566200c17782818110c7aa
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_hotel_maintenance</collection><condition>current.assignment_group.getDisplayValue() == gs.getProperty('x_hotel.maintenance.external_group') && previous.assignment_group != current.assignment_group</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Send to CHS Web Service</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var s = new sn_ws.SOAPMessageV2('x_hotel.CHS SOAP', 'create');
	s.setStringParameter('room', current.room.getDisplayValue());
	s.setStringParameter('number', current.number.getDisplayValue());
	s.setStringParameter('description', current.description);
	
	var response = s.execute();
	var responseBody = response.getBody();
	var status = response.getStatusCode();
	
	var xmldoc = new XMLDocument2();
	xmldoc.parseXML(responseBody);
	
	if (status == 200) {
		// 200 is success
		current.correlation_id = xmldoc.getNodeText("//data");
		current.work_notes = 'Successfully sent to external team';
	} else {
		current.work_notes = 'Did not successfully send to external team. ' +
		xmldoc.getNodeText("//faultstring");
	}
	current.update();
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-10-08 18:11:42</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5d47aa164f566200c17782818110c7aa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Send to CHS Web Service</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Hotel" source="x_hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5d47aa164f566200c17782818110c7aa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-10-08 18:11:42</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5d47aa164f566200c17782818110c7aa"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_eeefc1b54f1e2200c17782818110c7de
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_hotel.guestsWithReservations</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>guestsWithReservations</name><script><![CDATA[function guestsWithReservations() {
	var result = [];
	var res = new GlideRecord('x_hotel_m2m_guests_reservations');
	if (current.date) {
		res.addQuery('reservation.arrival', current.date);
	}
	res.query();
	while (res.next()) {
		result.push(res.guest + '');
	}
	var au = new global.ArrayUtil();
	return au.unique(result);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-10-06 22:32:36</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>eeefc1b54f1e2200c17782818110c7de</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>guestsWithReservations</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Hotel" source="x_hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_eeefc1b54f1e2200c17782818110c7de</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-10-06 22:38:49</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_hotel_check_in</collection><condition>current.room.changes() ||  current.date.changes() || current.operation() == 'insert'</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Stop duplicate check-ins</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var dup = new GlideRecord('x_hotel_check_in');
	dup.addQuery('room', current.room);
	dup.addQuery('date', current.date);
	dup.setLimit(1);
	dup.query();
	if (dup.hasNext()) {
		gs.addErrorMessage('This room is already checked in on this date.');
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-10-06 21:40:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>faa38db14f1e2200c17782818110c790</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Stop duplicate check-ins</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Hotel" source="x_hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_faa38db14f1e2200c17782818110c790</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-10-06 21:50:54</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=faa38db14f1e2200c17782818110c790"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_hotel.QuickQuery</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>QuickQuery</name><script><![CDATA[var QuickQuery = Class.create();
QuickQuery.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getField : function() {
		var table = this.getParameter('sysparm_table');
		var sys_id = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');
		var field = this.getParameter('sysparm_field');
		var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
		gr.get(sys_id);
		
		if (gr.isValidRecord())
			return gr[field];
		
		else return null;
		},
	
	type: "QuickQuery"
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-10-06 23:28:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>265c9d794f1e2200c17782818110c7ea</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>QuickQuery</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Hotel" source="x_hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_265c9d794f1e2200c17782818110c7ea</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-10-06 23:28:05</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_hotel_reservation</collection><condition>current.arrival > current.departure</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Sanity check dates</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	gs.addErrorMessage('Departure date must be after arrival');
	current.setAbortAction(true);
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-10-06 21:52:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2fc60df14f1e2200c17782818110c7cc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Sanity check dates</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Hotel" source="x_hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2fc60df14f1e2200c17782818110c7cc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-10-06 21:52:19</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2fc60df14f1e2200c17782818110c7cc"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_hotel.SimpleSubtract</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SimpleSubtract</name><script><![CDATA[var SimpleSubtract = Class.create();
SimpleSubtract.prototype = Object.extendsObject(SimpleAdd, {
	decrement: function () {
		this.number--;
		gs.info(this.number);
		return this;
	},
	type: 'SimpleSubtract'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-10-06 22:16:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c66c8d354f1e2200c17782818110c73f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SimpleSubtract</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Hotel" source="x_hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c66c8d354f1e2200c17782818110c73f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-10-06 22:17:44</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

SimpleAdd.prototype = {
	initialize: function (n) {
		gs.info('Creating new object');
		this.number = (n - 0) || 0;
	},
	increment: function () {
		this.number++;
		gs.info(this.number);
		return this;
	},
	type: 'SimpleAdd'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-10-06 22:14:33</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6aeb41754f1e2200c17782818110c73a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SimpleAdd</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Hotel" source="x_hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Hotel">a8f395beebc522004fcde08a5206fe2e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6aeb41754f1e2200c17782818110c73a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-10-06 22:18:57</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_9047c9f14f1e2200c17782818110c745
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_hotel_m2m_guests_reservations</collection><condition>current.lead.changesTo(true) || (current.lead && current.operation() ==    'insert')</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Force single lead passenger</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var lead = new GlideRecord('x_hotel_m2m_guests_reservations');
	lead.addQuery('reservation', current.reservation);
	lead.addQuery('lead', true);
	lead.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
	lead.query();
	while(lead.next()) {
		lead.lead = false;
		lead.update();
	}
